name: The Coil of Possibility
description:
The Coil of Possibility is a non-traditional, exploration focused RPG!

Join Dominique in his quest to find the truth behind the disappearance of his parents!

·Crafting and gathering!

The island houses many common and uncommon items useful for crafting. Logs, mushroom, rafflesias, web material...

Use the materials you've found to create state-of-the-art makeshift equipment! I mean, Dominique isn't a blacksmith. Can't be good at everything.

·Base-building lite elements!

As you explore the island, you will find multipe station kits which will allow you to make a variety of items. From healing potions, weapons and armors, to poisons! Find yoursef within the safety of a safe house (like a tent in the middle of the tundra or a forgotten farmhouse on the grassland) in order to install your new shinny crafting station! Spots within each base are limited, and so are the number of savepoints you can make. Installing a station is a permanent act!

·Pick your battes!

Don't rush blindly into battle! Dominique is not a warrior, and wil not gain combat experience by defeating enemies. There is nothing to be gained from combat... albeit, maybe there is a tool that lets you get items from defeated enemies.

·Zelda-like exploration!

Increase your chances of survival by finding crafting stations, bases,  shortcuts, materials, and even HP and Gauge increases! It might be wise to keep these in your inventory instead of rushing to increase your health, though.

·Find the fate of the research squad, and unveil the secret of the island!

·Multiple endings!

Not in the demo! About 5 by the time the game's done! Unless I go crazy and end up making like, 20.

Demo content:
·Tutorial
·Access to 5 areas: Grasslands, Tundra, Cave, Valley, and Forest.
·Access to movement item "Vine boots", which lets you climb vines.
·All 4 base elemental weapon kits.
·5 different kinds of enemy encounters, of which you'll hate one.
·And more!

*The demo has been cut from the current internal development version, and some elements may be desplayed as not yet implemented.

*For any bugs, feel free to reach out to me, either via twitter (@SpanishVanguard), the messageboard on this page, or via email... if you can find it.

*Anything found in the demo, is subject to change.
